title: About Me
text:
Vidhi A. Sharma



Hi, I’m Vidhi A. Sharma — a data-driven business analyst and current Master’s student in Applied Business Analytics at Boston University. With a background in Computer Science, I specialize in transforming complex data into clear, actionable strategies that help businesses work smarter.

title: About Me
text:
What I Do
I translate data into stories — ones that drive decisions, boost efficiency, and uncover opportunity. Whether it’s cleaning messy datasets, analyzing trends, or building dashboards that even your least tech-savvy manager can navigate, I focus on making insights accessible.
My toolkit includes Python, SQL, Tableau, Power BI, and cloud tools like AWS and Azure. But what sets me apart is my ability to blend technical depth with business clarity — turning complex models into solutions that actually work in the real world.

title: About Me
text:

Boston University, Master of Science – Applied Business Analytics (2024 – Present)
MIT World Peace University, Bachelor of Science – Computer Science (2019 – 2022)

title: About Me
text:
Let’s Collaborate
Whether you’re a business leader looking to understand your customers better, or a team struggling to make sense of your data — I can help. Let’s turn your questions into dashboards, and your hunches into measurable results.
